meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Room #1 C- South and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approve minutes from the January 9, 2023, Special-Called Civil Service Board Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Hearing Item
agenda_items.description: Hear the rehire eligibility appeal hearing of Mr. Isaac Ruiz, a former employee in the Courts and Detention Service Department.

agenda_items.title: Briefing and Discussion Items
agenda_items.description: Overview of Civil Services Rules Revision, Dallas Fire-Rescue Department; Civil Service 2024 Priorities; Civil Service Annual Report Review; Q1 Departmental Scorecard; Department Updates and Announcements.
